name: get_weather
description: Get the current weather for a specific city.

city.description: The name of the city to get weather for.

unit.description: Temperature unit to return results in.

name: get_news_headlines
description: Fetch the latest news headlines for a given topic.

topic.description: The topic to get headlines for, e.g. technology, sports, health.

name: convert_currency
description: Convert an amount between two currencies.

from_currency.description: The source currency code, e.g. USD.

to_currency.description: The target currency code, e.g. EUR.

name: get_flight_status
description: Retrieve the live status of a flight.

flight_number.description: The airline flight number, e.g. AA100 or LH760.

date.description: Date of the flight in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: find_restaurant
description: Find restaurants in a city that match a cuisine type.

city.description: City where to search for restaurants.

cuisine.description: Type of cuisine, e.g. Italian, Chinese, Mexican.

name: get_holiday_info
description: Check if a given date is a public holiday in a specific country.

date.description: The date to check, in YYYY-MM-DD format.

country.description: The country code, e.g. US or IN.

name: get_game_stats
description: Get the latest statistics for a sports team or player.

sport.description: Type of sport, e.g. basketball, football.

team_or_player.description: Name of the team or player.

name: calculate_bmi
description: Calculate Body Mass Index from weight and height.

name: search_movies
description: Search for movies by title, genre, or year.

query.description: The search term or movie title.

name: get_random_quote
description: Fetch a random inspirational or famous quote.

category.description: Type of quote, e.g. motivational, humorous, philosophical.
